SVGRectElementRx.summary: The rx read-only property of the interface describes the horizontal curve of the corners of an SVG rectangle as a . The length is in user coordinate system units along the x-axis. Its syntax is the same as that for <length>.

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGElement("rect")}} element's {{SVGAttr("rx")}} presentational attribute. The CSS rx property takes precedence over the SVG rx presentational attribute, so the value may not reflect the actual size of the rounded corners. The default value is 0, which draws a rectangle with square corners.
